reviewText: I love the selection of scenes, the narration is well-written and nicely delivered, the music is appropriate and low-key so as not to be distracting. Informative and great to look at. My only issue with this is that it's a little short, only about 22 minutes. Also would be great if it was full 16:9 format rather than the old TV 4:3 but that was the format when it was made.
